name: Headhunter (itch) (Moni)
description:
Headhunter is a 2D bullet-hell roguelike that focuses on boss design and game feel. The game adopts a pixel-art style with a top-down camera angle. The game follows the player character as they locate and hunt down wanted criminals within randomly generated dungeons. 

Headhunter was the final project I worked on in 2020 and was the capstone project for my Digital Design degree at AUT. 

All credits can be found within the game's main menu.
